company.intro_main: Wuxi Huangde International Trading Co., Ltd. is a professional service company specializing in turbocharger parts and common rail injector components supply.
company.intro_detail_1: Our professional team is dedicated to sourcing and providing high-quality turbocharger components and injector parts for global customers.
company.intro_detail_2: Providing high-performance automotive parts solutions for multiple industries.
company.intro_detail_3: With over 15 years of agency experience, ensuring every product meets the highest quality standards.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: This privacy policy outlines how Wuxi Huangde International Trading Co., Ltd. collects, uses, maintains and discloses information collected from users of our turbocharger supply website.
privacy.applies_to: This privacy policy applies to all business activities and online services of Wuxi Huangde International Trading Co., Ltd.

section1.title: 1. Information Collection Scope
section1.intro: We may collect your personal information in the following situations:
section1.inquiry: Product Inquiry: Name, company name, position, contact phone, email, mailing address
section1.consultation: Technical Consultation: Vehicle information, engine model, fault description, repair requirements
section1.order: Order Processing: Delivery address, payment information, invoice information
section1.service: After-sales Service: Product usage, feedback, service evaluation
section1.website_usage_details: IP address, browser type, access time, page browsing records
section1.business_intro: As a professional turbocharger supplier, we may also collect:
section1.business_type: Your business type (auto repair shops, parts dealers, individual users, etc.)
section1.technical_specs: Technical specification requirements and compatibility information
section1.logistics_preferences: Logistics delivery preferences and time requirements

section2.title: 2. Information Usage Purpose
section2.intro: We collect and use your personal information only for the following legitimate purposes:
section2.purpose1: Product Service Provision: Process your inquiries, quotations, order confirmations and product delivery
section2.purpose2: Customer Service: Provide technical support, after-sales service and problem resolution
section2.purpose3: Business Communication: Send product information, price updates, technical notifications
section2.purpose4: Quality Improvement: Analyze customer feedback to improve product and service quality
section2.purpose5_details: Complying with tax, customs and other legal and regulatory requirements
section2.purpose6_details: Preventing fraud, cyber attacks and other security threats

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing and Disclosure
section3.no_sale: We will never sell, lease or otherwise provide your personal information to third parties for commercial purposes.
section3.limited_sharing_intro: We may share your information in the following situations:
section3.logistics_details: Sharing necessary delivery information with courier companies
section3.payment_details: Sharing transaction-related information with banks or payment institutions
section3.technical_details: Sharing necessary technical data with IT service providers
section3.legal_details: Upon legitimate requests from government departments or judicial authorities
section3.business_transfer_details: During company mergers, acquisitions or asset transfers

section4.title: 4. Data Security Protection
section4.intro: We take the following measures to protect your personal information:
section4.measure1: Data Encryption: Use SSL/TLS encryption to transmit sensitive information
section4.measure2: Access Control: Strictly limit employee access to personal information
section4.measure3: Firewall Protection: Deploy enterprise-level firewalls and intrusion detection systems
section4.measure4: Regular Backup: Establish data backup and disaster recovery mechanisms
section4.measure5_details: Regular security assessments and vulnerability scans
section4.staff_training_details: Regular data protection and security awareness training
section4.access_control_details: Implementing minimum privilege principle and regular permission reviews
section4.incident_response_details: Establishing data breach emergency response mechanisms

section5.title: 5. Data Retention Period
section5.customer_info_details: Retained for 3 years after business relationship termination (tax requirements)
section5.transaction_records_details: Retained for 7 years after transaction completion (accounting law requirements)
section5.website_logs_details: Automatically deleted after 12 months of retention
section5.marketing_info_details: You can request to stop receiving and delete at any time
section5.dispute_handling_details: Related records deleted within 1 year after dispute resolution

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.intro: According to relevant laws and regulations, you have the following rights:
section6.right1_desc: You have the right to know what personal information we have collected about you
section6.right2_desc: You have the right to request us to correct inaccurate or incomplete personal information
section6.right3_desc: Under certain circumstances, you have the right to request us to delete your personal information
section6.right4_desc: You have the right to request us to restrict the processing of your personal information

contact.title: 7. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or need to exercise your rights, please contact us through the following methods:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Welcome to the turbocharger supply services of Wuxi Huangde International Trading Co., Ltd. By using our services, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions.
terms.applies_to: These terms of service apply to all commercial activities conducted through our website, phone, email and other channels.

section1.title: Service Scope
section1.item1: Turbocharger Assemblies: New and remanufactured products from various brands
section1.item2: Turbocharger Parts: Impellers, housings, actuators, sensors and other precision components
section1.item3: Common Rail Injectors: Bosch, Delphi, Denso and other brand injectors and parts
section1.item4: Repair Tools: Professional repair equipment and testing tools
section1.item5: Technical Documentation: Repair manuals, technical drawings, training materials

section2.title: 5. Quality Assurance and After-sales Service
section2.warranty1: Genuine Guarantee: All products are genuine with brand authorization certificates
section2.warranty2: Quality Testing: Strict quality testing before shipment
section2.warranty3: Packaging Protection: Professional packaging to ensure transportation safety
section2.warranty4: Quality Traceability: Complete product quality traceability system established
section2.warranty5_details: Continuously improving product quality and service levels

section3.title: 2. User Qualification and Registration
section3.user1: Corporate Users: Auto repair companies, parts dealers, trading companies with legal business qualifications
section3.user2: Professional Technicians: Repair technicians and engineers with relevant technical knowledge and experience
section3.user3: Individual Users: Natural persons over 18 years old with full civil capacity
section3.user4: International Users: Overseas customers who comply with local laws and regulations

section_product.title: 3. Products and Pricing
section_product.intro: We strive to ensure the accuracy of product information on our website, but due to technical limitations and frequent product updates, the following situations may occur:
section_product.tech_params_details: Subject to actual products and official technical documentation
section_product.product_images_details: For reference only, actual products may vary slightly
section_product.stock_status_details: Updated in real-time, but may have delays
section_product.compatibility_details: Recommend confirming vehicle compatibility before purchase

section_order.title: 4. Orders and Payment
section_order.step1_desc: Submit product requirements and get detailed quotations
section_order.step2_desc: Confirm product specifications, quantity, price and delivery time
section_order.step3_desc: Sign formal purchase contract or order agreement
section_order.step4_desc: Complete payment according to agreed method and schedule
section_order.step5_desc: Arrange shipment and provide logistics tracking information

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have any questions about these terms of service, please contact us through the following methods:
